scene: Beach gym confrontation - Venice Beach - 1987 DAWN

REX_ARMSTRONG.wardrobe: Red shorts, combat boots, NO SHIRT
REX_ARMSTRONG.appearance: Muscular but realistic, glistening with sweat

SOLLY.appearance: Obviously fake toupee, thin mustache, greasy face

2_action_sequence: ESTABLISHING: Wide shot of both characters
Rex facing Solly who sits in chair eating
Rex muscles tense looking at SOLLY
Solly doesn't look up at REX
Solly takes MASSIVE bite of chicken
Solly finally looks up at REX
Solly grips chicken like a club
Solly pulls chicken back aiming at REX
Solly SWINGS chicken at REX in wide arc
Chicken WHISTLES through air toward REX
LOUD SMACK as chicken hits REX
Grease EXPLODES off chicken onto REX
Chicken bones CRACK from hitting REX
Rex continues flying past broken bar
Solly looks down at REX in sand
Rex passes out face-down in sand
Rex passed out in sand background

3_scene_context.location: Muscle Beach outdoor gym at sunrise

4_camera_angles: START: Wide shot establishing both characters
CHICKEN HIT: Medium shot holding on impact
REX FLYING: Wide shot following Rex's flight
END: Low-angle shot looking up at Solly
5_camera_movements: 00:06-00:08: Camera tilts down to Rex, then up to Solly

7_visual_style.lighting: Golden sunrise, rim lighting on muscles

dialogue: REX SPEAKS TO SOLLY: Solly, I told you - Rex Armstrong is retired!
SOLLY SPEAKS TO REX: Nobody retires from Solly.
REX FROM GROUND: So juicy... ohhh
